attributes.description: A Luxury Sedan That Will Bring You Many Miles Of Driving Pleasure. The Classic Mercedes C Class Is Comfortable And Easy To Drive. Our 2018 Model Is Presented In White With A Black Leather Interior And Gloss Black Interior Trim. It Has Covered 86 000 km And Retains A Full Service History. Features Include A Panoramic Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, LED High Performance Lights, Cruise Control, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Seats, Bluetooth, USB Input, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 19 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Vehicle Is In Immaculate Condition. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
